Onehunga bus attack: Man arrested after woman fatally stabbed https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/onehunga-bus-attack-man-arrested-after-fatal-stabbing/EPR3Q3VAEZFPBF34LKV7PBG3VA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/onehunga-bus-attack-man-arrested-after-fatal-stabbing/EPR3Q3VAEZFPBF34LKV7PBG3VA/ A man handed himself in yesterday after a 24-hour manhunt. Thu, 24 Oct 2024 17:35:17 +0000 Police have released an image of Kael Leona in relation to a stabbing on a bus in Onehunga. He was last seen in the area wearing a dark jumper with shoes, he had a green t-shirt on his head and was carrying a black pack. The public were advised not to approach the man. Photo Composite: NZME/NZ Police
